sections.title: Project Overview
sections.content: Lightning Manager is an open-source tool designed to help node operators monitor and manage their Lightning Network nodes efficiently. Our goal is to provide a user-friendly interface that makes Lightning Network node management accessible to everyone, from beginners to advanced users.

sections.title: The Lightning Network
sections.content: The Lightning Network is a layer-2 scaling solution for Bitcoin that enables fast, low-cost transactions. It works by creating payment channels between users, allowing them to conduct multiple transactions without constantly recording them on the Bitcoin blockchain. This approach significantly improves transaction speed and reduces costs.

sections.title: Key Features
items: Real-time node monitoring with detailed metrics

sections.title: Lightning Network Advantages
items: Instant Payments: Transactions are settled in seconds
Low Fees: Minimal transaction costs compared to on-chain
Scalability: Millions of transactions per second possible
Cross-chain Potential: Framework for cross-blockchain transactions
Privacy: Better transaction privacy than on-chain

sections.title: Network Statistics
sections.content: The Lightning Network continues to grow rapidly. As of 2024, it has over 30,000 nodes, more than 100,000 channels, and a total network capacity exceeding 5,000 BTC. This growth demonstrates the increasing adoption and trust in Lightning Network technology.

sections.title: Get Involved
sections.content: Lightning Manager is an open-source project, and we welcome contributions from the community. Whether you're a developer, designer, or Lightning Network enthusiast, there are many ways to get involved and help improve the tool.
